R wrapper for SOFUN

Source: R/run_lm3ppa_f_bysite.R
run_lm3ppa_f_bysite.Rd

R wrapper for SOFUN

run_lm3ppa_f_bysite(
  sitename,
  params_siml,
  siteinfo,
  forcing,
  params_tile,
  params_species,
  params_soil,
  init_cohort,
  init_soil,
  makecheck = TRUE
)

Arguments

sitename

Site name
params_siml

Simulation parameters
siteinfo

Site meta info
forcing

forcing (input) dataframe (returned object by prepare_input_sofun)
params_tile

Tile-level model parameters
params_species

Species-specific model parameters
params_soil

Soil parameters (per soil layer)
init_cohort

Initial size of individuals in each of the N initally present cohorts
init_soil

Initial soil pool sizes
makecheck

A logical specifying whether checks are performed to verify forcings.

Details

This is the model
